title: SYSTEM:  Command execute_python_file returned: Error: Error while fetching server API version: (2, 'CreateFile', '系统找不到指定的文件。')
body:
### ⚠️ Search for existing issues first ⚠️

- [X] I have searched the existing issues, and there is no existing issue for my problem

### Which Operating System are you using?

Windows

### Which version of Auto-GPT are you using?

Latest Release

### GPT-3 or GPT-4?

GPT-3.5

### Steps to reproduce 🕹

GameRankGPT  has been created with the following details:
Name:  GameRankGPT
Role:  an AI that provides real-time rankings of the top 10 games by players across multiple platforms, including PC, console, and mobile.
Goals:
-  Continuously monitor player data from various sources to ensure accurate and up-to-date rankings.
-  Provide detailed insights into the factors driving the popularity of each game, including gameplay mechanics, graphics, and community engagement.
-  Identify emerging trends and predict future player behavior to help game developers and publishers stay ahead of the curve.
-  Offer personalized recommendations to individual players based on their gaming history and preferences.
-  Collaborate with game developers and publishers to optimize game design and marketing strategies for maximum player engagement.

### Current behavior 😯

NEXT ACTION:  COMMAND = execute_python_file ARGUMENTS = {'filename': 'C:\\autoGPT\\Auto-GPT\\autogpt\\auto_gpt_workspace\\analyze_top_10_games.py'}
Executing file 'C:\autoGPT\Auto-GPT\autogpt\auto_gpt_workspace\analyze_top_10_games.py'
Could not run the script in a container. If you haven't already, please install Docker https://docs.docker.com/get-docker/
SYSTEM:  Command execute_python_file returned: Error: Error while fetching server API version: (2, 'CreateFile', '系统找不到指定的文件。')

### Expected behavior 🤔

_No response_

### Your prompt 📝

```yaml
# Paste your prompt here
```
